content.rendered: I was wondering down Church Street last Friday when I spotted Lello, a chemist, looking very studious and dapper as he wrote thoughtfully on this sheet of paper. I walked past, not wanting to interrupt him, but the urge to get the picture was too strong so I went back and asked. He agreed, and also showed me what he’d been working on – a list of reasons to stop smoking. He didn’t seem completely convinced.
